cdist-type__postfix_postmap(7)
==============================

NAME
----
cdist-type__postfix_postmap - Run postmap on the given file


DESCRIPTION
-----------
This space intentionally left blank.


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.


EXAMPLES
--------

.. code-block:: sh

    __postfix_postmap /etc/postfix/generic
